ygData.subject: Updated Languages Listing
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a Bard of thr 14th song on Fennin Ro, and I have 24 languages currently.  I am working with a friend to raise the skill level in a few of them that are
ygData.messageBody:
I am a Bard of thr 14th song on Fennin Ro, and I have 24 languages
currently. I am working with a friend to raise the skill level in a
few of them that are still only average, but most are at excellent now.

Dark Speech Dragon
Tier'dal Faerie
Elder Teir'dal Orcish
Gnomish Lizardman
Halfling Kobold
Ogre Gnoll
Troll Goblin
Dwarvish Froglok
Elvish Giant's Tongue
Elder Elvish Thieves' Cant
Erudian Barbarian
Old Erudian Common

After getting them all up to excellent skill level, I will be working
on the mastery level.

~Umbriel~
